metadata.title: CVE-2023-6110 on Ubuntu 24.10 (oracular) - medium
metadata.description:
A flaw was found in OpenStack. When a user tries to delete a non-existingaccess rule in it's scope, it deletes other existing access rules which arenot associated with any application credentials.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2023-6110` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

python3-openstackclient - 6.3.0-0ubuntu1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: python-openstackclient package in oracular, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '6.3.0-0ubuntu1').
